Description:
Perfect to live in or invest
A wonderful location close to leisure facilities and public transport, this is the perfect investment or to move in for yourself. With an open plan living and dining area you don't feel hemmed in and with the kitchen boasting plenty of storage and natural light there is plenty of room for making the perfect meal.
Features of this home include; two good sized bedrooms both with built-in robes, three-piece bathroom, separate laundry and toilet, gas heating and air conditioning. With a single lock up garage and an extra spot to park in front of it, plus a secure low maintenance yard, this home provides an easy living option for an owner occupier or tenant.

Description:
ESTABLISHED BRICK HOME IN A GREAT LOCALE NEAR SCHOOLS & AQUATIC CENTRE
This home offers the perfect first home or investment property. Surrounded by quality schools and parklands, this well maintained and presented family home is yours for the taking!!
Positioned in the Crusoe College School Zone, the home offers three bedrooms, master with ensuite, central bathroom, two additional bedrooms all with built in robes, lounge, kitchen/meals opening up to an excellent covered outdoor entertaining area and rear yard with side access and large shed with side street access.
Other features include shedding (including toilet in the shed), split system, 10,000 litre rain water tank, great sized block measuring 747m2 approx.
Inspection a must!!

Description:
Exceptional family living - magnificent family home
- Enjoy light-filled formal and informal living zones (3 living areas plus study)
- Delightful home has two master bedrooms with ensuites ideal for dual family living
- Separate formal lounge and dining, separate rumpus room or theatre room and open plan kitchen/meals/family room plus study
- Yes dispaly home features, quality fittings and fixtures, high ceilings, cathedral ceiling, roman blinds, pelmet curtains, mirrored robes, glass wall windows etc
- Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling for all seasons
- Chefs kitchen with quality appliances and overlooking large kitchen/meals and family room
- Fully irrigated garden and a rain water storage tank with 25000 litre capacity, all on 886m2
- Double garage and lock up garden shed, relaxed outdoor terrace and extensive paving
- Close to shopping centres, public transport, schools and being on the Melbourne side of Bendigo is an added bonus. Crusoe Heights Reserve oval is only 100 metres away.
Offering 32 squares of living on an 886m2 allotment this former dispaly home (Built 2004) has certainly been buit to an extremely high standard to please all. Upon entering the grand entrance this sophisticated and elegant 4 bedroom family home offers a fine selection of living spaces for entertaining and family living. With its beautiful street presence and great elevated crest location this magnificent home leaves many in its wake. An inspection will allow you to appreciate the lifestyle that this home has to offer.

Description:
Dream Home Site, Idyllic lifestyle
- Picturesque bush setting located on the rural living fringe between Big Hill and Kangaroo Flat.
- 8 acres of land with cleared home site, a rare find in such close proximity to urban Bendigo
- Approved Planning Permit for a residential dwelling
- Power and Town Water available
- Adjoins reserve and a short stroll to No.7 Crusoe Reservoir and parkland
- A short drive to Kangaroo Flat Shopping
DIRECTIONS FROM BENDIGO: Turn right at Harvey Norman and take first left into Granter Street. Drive for approximately 1km, turn right into Hammill Street.

Description:
RETIREMENT LIVING WITH STYLE AND SPACE
Downsize and enjoy a relaxed lifestyle without compromising on space. This well-appointed and lovingly maintained two-bedroom villa in the friendly Rosedale Residential Village offers very affordable independent and pet-friendly living, with public transport out front and Lansell Square shopping just across the road. Boasting a fantastic sized master bedroom with bay windows letting in great natural light, while both bedrooms have built-in robes.
Entry via the front verandah leads to the spacious open plan lounge and adjoining kitchen/dining area with electric appliances, dishwasher, plenty of bench space and ample storage. A comfortable bathroom includes oversized shower, vanity and toilet. Ducted heating, split system aircon/heating and ceiling fans ensure year-round comfort. The second bedroom could easily become a sunroom, office or craft room. With double linen storage, clever Euro laundry and private access to the carport, garden shed & clothesline, this one is great value.
Small village atmosphere so you're not lost in the crowd
No Council Rates
No water/sewerage charges
Electricity, gas and telephone with providers of your choice
Community hall includes pool table, kitchen, bingo, carpet bowls, TV area, library and is ideal for functions, birthdays etc with family members welcome

Description:
TIDY & SECURE
This neat and tidy brick unit will delight singles, the elderly and investors alike so much so you will be booking the removalist today! Set snug at the rear as one of only two on the block, the unit is private and secluded from the road, has its own title, and no body corporate fees to worry about - a welcome relief when comparing its peers!
A convenient location offers transport at your doorstep and close proximity between Golden Square and Kangaroo Flat shopping precincts. Low maintenance and easy care, the unit has a very recent rental history attracting $270 per week, but is currently available with vacant possession and ready for you to occupy!
The floor plan is as neat as a pin and very comfortable as is, but although not essential, the possibility of a cosmetic spruce would only benefit your asset if you choose. Boasting two carpeted bedrooms, both with built in robes, bathroom featuring both bath and shower and a separate toilet, and laundry with good storage. At the heart of the home is the good sized open plan kitchen dining and living area, which has gas heating and air-conditioning. The kitchen is in good order and serviceable for now with gas cooking and a generous meals space, whilst the lounge room has a sunny view though sizeable windows! Outside is a low maintenance, easy care yard that is secure and private. There is room for your own garden ideas, and a small dog to roam and keep you company. Car accommodation is thanks to a single automated garage.
A convenient location with no body corporate fees, this private and secure unit is in excellent order and would make a fantastic home or investment. Available with vacant possession, call now to inspect!

Description:
PERFECT FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY!
Are you looking for a start in the property market or maybe you are looking for that perfect investment property? Well look no further as this home would be a superb owner occupier or investment property.
The floor plan consists of three spacious carpeted bedrooms; the master bedroom comes with a three-door built in robe and the other two bedrooms are of a good size. The kitchen is in very good order and has plenty of bench space, gas wall oven & cooktop, a corner pantry plus there is sufficient space for a family sized dining table in the adjacent dining area. The carpeted lounge is of a good size and has a large window that lets in plenty of natural light and a wall mounted heater & air conditioner. For extra comfort, there is ducted evaporative cooling throughout. The family bathroom consists of shower, bath, vanity and heat lamps to take the chill off those cooler mornings. The laundry and separate toilet complete the internal layout.
Externally is a paved alfresco/entertaining area with shade cloth structure, grassed, secure rear yard for the kids or pets to play, single carport with side access to the 6.8m x 5.1m shed complete with concrete floor & power which provides extra car accommodation or storage, all on a 543m2 (approx) allotment.
With shops, schools, (pre-school, primary & secondary), transport, Rotary Park Lake, sporting facilities including the new Aquatic Centre nearby and the CBD of Bendigo an easy 8-minute drive away, the home is in a great position. With an excellent tenant already in place and rental income of $250 per week, this is an opportunity not to be missed. Call now to arrange an inspection!
Insights: 12 Ford Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Semi renovated opportunity for owner occupiers and investors alike
Located in a quiet pocket of Kangaroo Flat you will find this fantastic opportunity for an owner occupier or an investor looking for a quality addition to the portfolio.
Before even entering the home you will notice the fantastic street appeal. Located on a corner block you will find an abundance of space out the front with a car garage with capacity for 4 cars.
Entering the home you will be greeted by high ceilings. Timber laminate lines the floor and wide open hallways give you a great sense of space as soon as you step in the door. Located down the left hand side of the hallway you will find three bedrooms, 1 with robes built in and all three offering ample space. On the right hand side you will find a lounge room with built in gas log fire.
Moving forward you will find the completely renovated kitchen area. Neutral colour pallets, a dishwasher a completely new kitchen suite complete the renovation work and truly make the kitchen the heart of the home.
Located toward the rear of the home you will find a bathroom complete with bath. Excess storage and a laundry area with a toilet.
Outside the home you will find side access from [Insert street] and enough enclosed space for the kids and dogs to run around freely.
Located in the heart of Kangaroo Flat you will find your new home within close proximity to the newly opened Gurri Wanyarra swimming centre, the High Street shopping strip, public transport, parks and public facilities and within a 10 minute drive to Lansell Square shopping centres and the Bendigo CBD.
If this property ticks all the boxes for you call the team at Ray White Bendigo today.

Description:
THE CREST HERITAGE BEAUTY & ADDED LIVING
An easy walk to school, shops, bus stops and train station and sitting on a generous landscaped corner allotment is The Crest: a stunning 1878-built period home. With the added bonus of a self-contained unit with its own driveway and entry, this incredible property truly is one of a kind.
The main house is one of Kangaroo Flats first permanent buildings and many heritage details have been lovingly retained offering character and charm. Features such as 12, timber-lined ceilings; timber mantles over original fireplaces; decorative cornice, ceiling roses and corbels; timber fretwork; picture railing; stained glass windows and generously proportioned rooms all add a sense of grandeur to this attractive home. Modern additions such as the contemporary bathroom and modern country kitchen ensure that every convenience is taken care of.
Three large bedrooms can be found at the front of the home, off the central hallway, and two feature built-in robes and ceiling fans. A formal lounge, also off the hall, showcases beautiful stain glass windows. A family bathroom, recently renovated with a double vanity; and a large and light laundry, with additional powder room, provide services for all.
At the rear of the home is a large open plan kitchen and dining room. The recently renovated kitchen sits beautifully within the walls of the grand old home offering contemporary country-style cabinetry and high-end appliances. Off the dining room is a large living room with dual aspect windows providing plenty of light.
The entire property sits on over quarter of an acre and the established cottage garden at the front of the house beautifully complements the bullnose verandah and iron lacework. At the rear, through French doors from both dining and living rooms, is a fabulous alfresco area and a pizza oven that will make outdoor dining a great experience year-round. Established trees, offering both shade and fruit, include lemon, blood orange and passionfruit, and shedding plus a double carport allows room for vehicles and tools.
The real bonus of this property is the fully self-contained cottage at the rear of the property. Featuring bedroom, bathroom, laundry, kitchen and living area, the cottage also includes air conditioning, gas heating and ceiling fan. The kitchen includes a dishwasher and brand new oven with separate grill and four-burner electric cooktop. Absolutely ideal for a granny flat, teenage retreat, home business or Airbnb, this great space also includes its own private driveway and access from the side street.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and heating throughout
Modern appliances in the kitchen including dishwasher and 900mm Westinghouse oven with ceramic cooktop
Secure vehicle access to the rear yard, ideal for additional storage for trailer or caravan
2kW solar panels with 3kW inverter (66c rebate until 2024)
Water tank
Garden shed x 2 (7 x 4m and 2 x 7m) plus workshop
Located on the Melbourne side of Bendigo, this grand property is just an hour and a half from the states capital, whilst also walking distance to all amenities, including the Kangaroo Flat train station. This is a fantastic opportunity for a buyer who is looking for more out of their home, yet still seeking a small piece of Bendigos outstanding heritage beauty.
Insights: 19 Church Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2017 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Beautifully Presented Family Home
Presented impeccably, this incredibly welcoming property, will have you feeling at home immediately.
Conveniently located, this four bedroom, two bathroom modern home is sure to impress even the most fastidious of buyers.
Stepping inside you will find the master suite which is an oasis with double vanity ensuite and ample walk-in robe.
Moving down the entry hallway you will find the central hub of the home. With a fully equipped open-plan kitchen and meals area boasting stainless steel appliances and excellent storage capacity. The beautifully landscaped gardens surrounding the home, can be appreciated from various vantage points and includes a large undercover entertaining area, extending out from the kitchen family room. This modern home has recently been painted and has brand new carpets throughout. The climate will be comfortable all year round with ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling.
A fantastic location in a quiet street, with Kangaroo Flat Primary School and Crusoe College within walking distance and only minutes to High Street shops, the new Aquatic and Leisure Centre as well as sporting facilities and bushland reserves.
This is the home you have been waiting for.

Description:
NOT JUST THE AVERAGE TOWNHOUSE
Don't judge this one till you've seen inside. What looks like a modest unit from kerbside is in fact a very spacious and modern townhouse boasting three robed bedrooms (WIR to main), a large study/home office, expansive living and dining areas and two bathrooms.
Tiled floors flow from the front entry throughout the residence including the front lounge with bay window while the sleek, galley-style kitchen is comparable to one you would expect to see in a grand family home. The central hub of the open-plan living area, it has room to prepare a banquet for a large contingent of family and friends.
A huge island bench with a gleaming black bench top is complemented by loads of white cabinetry and stunning glass splash backs with electric cooking appliances, dishwasher and large corner pantry.
If working from home is a requirement, the study is ideally located off the dining area and the whole residence is serviced by evaporative air conditioning and gas heating.
A small courtyard off the dining area is the perfect place to enjoy breakfast in the winter sun and the lock-up garage has direct access to the residence making unloading the car a breeze.
Life is too short to spend weekends fretting over domestic matters, this minimal maintenance townhouse and garden is meticulously finished and ideally located close to Lansell Square shops, bus stop etc.
Insights: 6B Archer Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2019 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Well-presented home in a fantastic location on over 1 acre
Located in a popular location, you will find this spacious and well-presented 3-bedroom brick veneer home. On a large 4260m2 allotment, the home would suit families, investors, 1st home buyers or retirees who still need some extra space outside. All 3 bedrooms have built-in robes, with the main also having an ensuite. The very large kitchen offers plenty of bench space, double fan-forced oven and large fridge space. The adjacent dining area has a wall furnace, and entry door from the single garage for added security. Ducted evaporative cooling, 3-piece bathroom and gas hot water service.
Outside is a great-sized backyard with plenty of shedding.
The main shed is 10m x 6m with power and concrete floor, great for the home handyman or storage for the caravan, boat or trailer. Just a short drive to schools, Kangaroo Flat shopping centre and sporting facilities.
A well-presented home in a very popular location with a very spacious allotment. Inspection is a must.

Description:
Opportunity awaits first home buyer or investor.
This three bedroom home is an ideal start to get into your own home and get out of the rental cycle.
It offers a light-filled lounge, roomy meals area and kitchen with electric cooking. All three bedrooms feature built-in robes and ceiling fans and are located close to the bathroom. Solar panels on the roof provide a cost effective way of living currently receiving 60c per kw back to the grid.
As-new ducted heating keeps it cosy in winter with a wall-mounted air conditioner in the living areas for summer.
The laundry includes broom closet and access to a covered and paved alfresco area with a lush fernery alongside adding a cool, green touch.
The approx 586m² block includes double garage with concrete floor and power connected for car accommodation or for the man of the house to tinker in and plenty of room in the backyard for kids and pets to play.
This is a fantastic opportunity to secure your very own home at a reasonable price and get off the rental roundabout forever.
